title: Replace app logo with user-provided image

requirements.summary: Replace the current app logo/favicon with the user-provided image showing a black dog and orange cat with a surgical scalpel on a blue background
acceptanceCriteria: The user-provided image is used as the app logo throughout the application
Favicon references in frontend/index.html are updated to use the new logo
The new logo displays correctly in the browser tab and any UI areas showing the app logo

file_operations.description: Remove the old favicon.ico file to replace with the new user-provided logo image
Add the user-provided image (image.png showing black dog and orange cat with surgical scalpel on blue background) as the new app logo at frontend/public/logo.png
Update favicon link references to point to the new logo.png file instead of the old generated favicon files. Replace the current favicon link tags with a single link tag pointing to /logo.png
